mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalRows FROM ( SELECT ct.template_code AS templateCode, ct.template_name AS templateName, COUNT(ct.template_code) as templateCount FROM carrier_template ct GROUP BY template_code, template_name ) AS subquery;

SELECT ct.template_code AS templateCode, ct.template_name AS templateName, COUNT(ct.template_code) as templateCount FROM carrier_template ct group by template_code, template_name LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT tc.template_coordinate_id AS templateCoordinateId, tc.template_code AS templateCode, tc.template_type AS templateType, tc.template_image_order AS templateImageOrder, tc.template_coordinate_name AS templateCoordinateName, tc.template_input_type AS templateInputType, tc.template_input_option AS templateInputOption, tc.font_style AS fontStyle, tc.font_size AS fontSize, tc.coordinate_x_axis AS coordinateXAxis, tc.coordinate_y_axis AS coordinateYAxis, CONCAT(ct.template_code ,'/' , ct.template_image_name) AS templateImagePath, tc.registered_datetime AS registeredDatetime FROM template_coordinate tc INNER JOIN carrier_template ct ON tc.template_code = ct.template_code AND tc.template_image_order = ct.template_image_order WHERE tc.template_code = #{templateCode}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ct.registered_datetime) AS rowNum, ct.carrier_template_id AS carrierTemplateId, ct.template_code AS templateCode, ct.template_name AS templateName, ct.template_image_order AS templateImageOrder, ct.template_image_name AS templateImageName, DATE_FORMAT(ct.registered_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registeredDatetime FROM carrier_template ct WHERE ct.template_code = #{templateCode} ORDER BY ct.registered_datetime DESC
